testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify BeachStay Villas branding is displayed
Check for functional search bar with location, dates, and guest inputs
Verify 'Featured Villas' section loads with villa cards
Check for 'Popular Beach Destinations' section
Verify navigation menu with Login/Signup or user profile
Test 'List Your Villa' button functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows a fully functional beach villa rental platform with real features and interactivity
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Core Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test that homepage components are properly implemented and functional
steps: Load homepage and verify hero section with background image
Test search form with location input, check-in/check-out dates, and guest count
Verify search form submission navigates to search results
Check Featured Villas carousel displays villa cards with images, titles, prices
Test villa card clicks navigate to villa detail pages
Verify Popular Destinations section shows clickable destination cards
Test destination clicks navigate to filtered search results
testCases.expectedOutcome: All homepage components are interactive and functional with proper navigation

testCases.name: Navigation and Menu Test
testCases.description: Test navigation components and user menu functionality
steps: Verify top navigation bar with BeachStay Villas logo
Test logo click returns to homepage
Check search bar in navigation (desktop view)
Test 'List Your Villa' button in navigation
Verify user profile menu (login/signup when not authenticated)
Test mobile menu toggle and functionality
Check footer links and content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation is fully functional with proper responsive behavior

testCases.name: Villa Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test villa search and filtering capabilities
steps: Navigate to search page or use homepage search
Enter location in search field
Select check-in and check-out dates
Set number of guests
Submit search and verify results page loads
Check villa cards display with images, titles, prices, ratings
Test filtering options (price, bedrooms, amenities)
Verify sorting functionality (price, rating, etc.)
Test pagination if multiple pages of results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works with proper filtering and result display

testCases.name: Villa Details Page Test
testCases.description: Test villa detail page functionality and booking flow
steps: Navigate to a villa details page
Verify villa information displays (title, description, photos)
Check amenities list and villa rules
Verify pricing information and availability calendar
Test photo gallery/carousel functionality
Check reviews section displays properly
Test booking form with date selection and guest count
Verify 'Book Now' or similar booking action
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa details page shows comprehensive information with functional booking interface

testCases.name: User Authentication Test
testCases.description: Test user login, signup, and authentication flows
steps: Navigate to login page
Verify login form with email and password fields
Test form validation (empty fields, invalid email)
Navigate to signup page
Verify signup form with required fields
Test signup form validation
Check password reset functionality
Verify user menu changes when authenticated
Test logout functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication system works with proper form validation and state management

testCases.name: Guest Dashboard Test
testCases.description: Test guest user dashboard and profile management
steps: Login as guest user
Navigate to guest dashboard
Verify dashboard displays user information and stats
Check 'My Trips' section for bookings
Test wishlists functionality
Navigate to profile edit page
Verify profile form with user information
Test profile update functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest dashboard provides comprehensive user management features

testCases.name: Host Features Test
testCases.description: Test host-specific features and villa management
steps: Access host signup or onboarding flow
Verify host onboarding wizard with villa creation steps
Test villa information form (title, description, location)
Check photo upload functionality
Test amenities selection
Verify pricing and availability settings
Navigate to host dashboard
Check villa management features
Test reservation management
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host features provide complete villa management capabilities

testCases.name: Booking Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete booking process from search to confirmation
steps: Search for villas with specific dates and guests
Select a villa from search results
Navigate to villa details page
Select dates and guest count for booking
Proceed to booking form
Fill in guest information
Review booking summary with pricing breakdown
Complete booking process
Verify booking confirmation page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking flow works from search to confirmation

testCases.name: Messaging System Test
testCases.description: Test messaging functionality between guests and hosts
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to messaging/inbox
Verify message threads display
Test opening a message thread
Check message history display
Test sending a new message
Verify unread message indicators
Check real-time message updates
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messaging system provides functional communication between users

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test homepage on desktop view (1920x1080)
Verify layout on tablet view (768px width)
Check mobile view (375px width)
Test navigation menu on mobile (hamburger menu)
Verify search form responsiveness
Check villa cards layout on different screens
Test form layouts on mobile devices
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: Data Loading and Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test data loading states and error handling
steps: Observe loading states when data is being fetched
Verify loading spinners or skeleton screens
Test error states when API calls fail
Check retry functionality for failed requests
Verify empty states when no data is available
Test network error handling
Check graceful degradation when services are unavailable
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles loading states and errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Content Quality and Professional Appearance Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful content and professional design
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure and typography
Look for actual villa listings with real-looking data
Ensure professional color scheme and design consistency
Check for proper spacing and layout
Verify images load properly and are appropriately sized
Check for consistent branding throughout the application
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality with professional design and meaningful content

testCases.name: Basic Performance Test
steps: Measure initial page load time
Check for smooth scrolling and interactions
Verify images load efficiently
Test navigation speed between pages
Check for any obvious performance bottlenecks
Verify smooth animations and transitions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application performs well with reasonable load times and smooth interactions

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Test
steps: Check for proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3)
Verify form labels are properly associated
Test keyboard navigation through interactive elements
Check color contrast for text readability
Verify alt text for images
Test screen reader compatibility for key features
